name: Design products with Figma (Mandarin)
description:
In PicCollage, we value the collaboration process. In this file you will see how we iterate our implementation process. We will keep iterating this in the future.


Contents:

  1. How we prepared for moving from Sketch to Figma
  2. What we prepared:
  • File structure
  • Handoff structure
  • Flow & Annotation guidelines
  • UI spec guidelines
  • Asset delivery


Any feedback is welcome!
